channel.title: Notes from 2022 on Shermans's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Notes from 2022 on Shermans's Notes

item.title: June 2nd, 2022
item.description: shermanrose.uk dev Found an issue with obsidian-export It escapes unsafe HTML characters without a way to disable this. This is causing havoc with trying to use shortcodes. That explains why I have had no luck using the < > code format over the % % format. I’m going to have to do that rewrite I didn’t want to do, as I’m not interested in learning Rust right now. Further Site Dev Work I found this working on the front page of the site.
